attributes.additional_details:
There was no mention of NHS. reforms in the manifesto's  of  either  of the co-alition parties. These reforms are being driven by ideological beliefs in a market economy   and this is extremely worrying for the 90% of ordinary people in this country who rely on the NHS.

Capitalism in it's present form simply does not work except for the top 10% of the population. These reforms will see a banking type crisis in the NHS
